titles.title: Providing consideration of the bill (H.R. 7176) to repeal restrictions on the export and import of natural gas.
Providing consideration of the bill (H.R. 7176) to repeal restrictions on the export and import of natural gas.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 118-388, by Mr. Reschenthaler.
The resolution provides for consideration of H.R. 7176 under a closed rule with one hour of general debate and one motion to recommit.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 63.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1009.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H. Res. 1009, the Chair put the question on ordering the previous question and by voice vote, announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. McGovern demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings until a time to be announced.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 212 - 206 (Roll no. 45).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 212 - 208 (Roll no. 46).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution provides for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 7176) to repeal restrictions on the export and import of natural gas.
